nodes.text: The Mon Calamari battle baton was a simple energy weapon in the shape of a ribbed scepter. They were wielded as a status symbol by Mon Calamari officers. One such weapon was wielded by Captain Ackbar during the Second Battle of Mon Calamari.

The baton that Ackbar holds in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episodes "Water War" and "Prisoners" is an homage to his 1983 action figure that came with such an accessory. Though it was not originally intended to be a weapon, the episodic director Danny Keller vividly remembered pretending it was a blaster, so it was worked into the show.
